location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Hinde Pelly, Deputy Military Paymaster General, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: There is evidence that an enclosure was once attached to the item, however it has become detached and is no longer present in the volume.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an extract of retrenchments (not present) for the Deputy Military Paymaster General's disbursements for February 1815.
